Uses of Class
sistema.Spettacolo

    • Uses of Spettacolo in sistema

      Fields in sistema with type parameters of type Spettacolo 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.LinkedList<Spettacolo>> Sala.programmazione 
      Methods in sistema that return Spettacolo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Spettacolo Spettacolo.getNextSpettacolo(int amount)
      Returns an object of type Spettacolo with the same attributes of this Spettacolo except for dataInizio, that is modified depending on the input If the amount is 0, it returns a clone of this Spettacolo
      Methods in sistema with parameters of type Spettacolo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Sala.addShow(Spettacolo spettacolo, int numberOfDays)
      Adds a show schedule (defined by the show and the number of days you want to keep it in schedule) to the corresponding list of shows of the map programmazione, keeping the list sorted by key.
      boolean ApplicazioneGestoreCinema.addShows(int cinemaId, Spettacolo spettacolo, int numberOfDays, int idSala)
      Adds a show to the schedule of the cinema (specified by the id passed as input) depending on the number of days you want to keep it in schedule.
      boolean Cinema.addShows(Spettacolo spettacolo, int numberOfDays, int idSala)
      Adds a a show schedule (defined by the show and the number of days you want to keep it in schedule) to the map programmazione of the sala (defined by its id) of the cinema.
      int Spettacolo.compareTo(Spettacolo s) 
      boolean Sala.verifyAvailability(Spettacolo spettacolo, int numberOfDays)
      Verify the room availability for the entire schedule of the show passed as input (depending on numberOfDays that represents the number of days you want to keep the show in schedule).
      private boolean Sala.verifyAvailabilitySingleShow(Spettacolo spettacolo)
      Verify the room availability for the show passed as input.
      java.util.ArrayList<Sala> ApplicazioneGestoreCinema.verifyRoomsAvailability(int cinemaId, Spettacolo spettacolo, int numberOfDays)
      Verify the availability of the rooms of the cinema (specified by the id passed as input) for a show passed as input depending on the number of days you want to keep it in schedule.
      java.util.ArrayList<Sala> Cinema.verifyRoomsAvailability(Spettacolo spettacolo, int numberOfDays)
      Verify the availability of the rooms of this cinema for the entire schedule of the show passed as input (depending on numberOfDays that represents the number of days you want to keep the show in schedule).
